metadata.title: CVE-2022-4179 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Audio in Google Chrome prior to 108.0.5359.71 allowed anattacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted Chrome Extension.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
